April 2015. By an amended petition: Petitioner has sought inter alia the following relief:

filed on 27th November 2015, the: A  Writ  of  Prohibition  prohibiting  the  1st  and/or  6th  Respondent  from
issuing a charge sheet to the Petitioner;
A  Writ  of  Certiorari  quashing  the  decision  contained  in  ‘P13’,  ‘P14’  and
‘P15’ not to issue the Petitioner with a vehicle permit in terms of ‘P8a’;
A Writ of Mandamus to compel the 1st, 3rd or the 4th Respondents to issue
the Petitioner a vehicle permit in terms of ‘P8a’.
